data.title: TenTenths Motorsport Forum
data.meta_description: TenTenths Motorsport Forum.  Thousands of users, OVER 3 million posts on motorsport around the world. NASCAR, Formula 1, CART, IRL, A1 GP, you'll find them all at Ten-Tenths.
data.text:
Formula One (310 Viewing)

Regarded by most as the pinnacle of worldwide formula racing - a sport watched by millions worldwide.

21,376 784,234

Indycar Series (31 Viewing)

American-based open-wheel racing including the legendary Indy 500. Ahhh... unification, it's a little like what happened in Germany when the Berlin Wall came down. Does anyone read these forum descriptions?

by bjohnsonsmith

8 Aug 2024 11:48

1,099 48,802

National & International Single Seaters (38 Viewing)

Want to know who the next big star is? Interested in the new F2 spec? International and national single seaters covers series from Formula Ford Zetec to Formula Renault across the world, bringing in Aussie, British and Euro f3 and Nippon along the wa

5,124 135,265

Club Level Single Seaters (14 Viewing)

Involved in a club level series? Want to discuss testing dates or simply interested in what makes the series tick? This is the place to discuss anything from the rapidly expanding ff1600 to formula jedi, and to meet the participants and organisers.

2,200 44,182

Historic Racing Today (102 Viewing)

For those who love driving or watching 'old' racing cars. So whether your interest is in events for Pre war, 1950's sports, saloons from the 70's or 80's, TGP racing or ANY other historic class, you can talk about it here.

3,981 204,813

Motorsport History (64 Viewing)

Over 100 years of motor racing history behind us means there is much to discuss. Cars - from 1906 GP Renault to Williams FW14B. Races - The Gordon Bennett Trophy to the Group C/GTP era. Drivers - from Jenatzy to Senna. There's no end to it!

3,980 70,720

The Chassis History Archive (12 Viewing)

A research tool for chassis historians. Every racing car has a history! Some are notable but all are unique. Here we try to compile histories of as many chassis as possible, ancient and modern.

by Layabout

3 Aug 2024 22:42

464 21,816

Rallying & Rallycross (36 Viewing)

Fast, exciting and accesible, rallying is fast establishing itself as one of the most popular areas of the sport across the globe. Rallycross combines tarmac and gravel in a high speed, high thrill format of short heats leading to an often thrilling SuperFinal.

Sub-Forums: Video Clips

4,782 75,593

Bike Racing (63 Viewing)

For all bike racing - Superbikes, Moto GP, Sidecar, Road Racing, Moto-X, Speedway, etc, etc.

2,628 39,382

Kart Racing (9 Viewing)

The ultimate high - at 1" off the ground! The sport of karting has many different categories, from 60cc Cadet karts for 8 year olds, right up to the 160mph 250cc Superkarts and it even holds its own World Championships.

790 7,597

Drifting (3 Viewing)

Discuss drifting, precision driving and all other areas of alternative motorsport!

112 818

Hillclimb and Sprint (12 Viewing)

Hillclimbs, sprints (UK style!), time trials and other speed events

by flatlandsman

27 Jun 2024 07:52

722 7,740

Marshals Forum (60 Viewing)

A place for anyone to meet and chat about the ins and outs of life as a marshal. Although this forum is intended for the marshals themselves, they are always pleased to speak to anyone who ventures in!

by MonteCristo

5 Jun 2024 16:23

9,669 193,968

Racers Forum (13 Viewing)

A forum which is coming from a different angle than the rest - it's a forum for the drivers themselves - whatever class they race in!

Sub-Forums: Racers Classifieds

by chris68

26 Feb 2024 10:29

2,023 36,363

Racing Technology (44 Viewing)

Have a question about the more technical side of motorsport ? Need to ask someone about the merits of a V8 over a V10, about how wings generate downforce ? Here is the place to ask!

2,668 31,377

Motorsport Art & Photography (19 Viewing)

A place to discuss all aspects of motorsport art & photography - from techniques and materials/equipment, through subject matter, to critique of your work.

by dwh43scale

3 Oct 2023 12:43

2,129 22,812

Trackside (17 Viewing)

A place for you to plan your trips to the circuit - arrange meet-ups with old friends, or seek advice on the best place to watch from, the best bar to drink at, etc.

Sub-Forums: Events Calendar

2,377 41,937

My Track Designs (31 Viewing)

Building on the success of the "My Tracks" thread there is now a specific sub-forum for the budding and not so budding track designers on Ten-Tenths.

1,282 28,697

Tributes Forum (6 Viewing)

A place to remember people from the world of motorsport who are sadly no longer with us. Please feel free to bring your tributes and memories here, but please remember to tread gently. This is not the forum for debates.

by Tim Falce

10 Jul 2024 17:42

916 8,373

News and information from the teams and organisations involved with motorsport. To have your press release added e-mail it to press@ten-tenths.com

- - -

Road Car Forum (24 Viewing)

After many requests, we have finally added a forum for you to chat about all things related to road cars and general motoring; from the price of petrol, to how to replace a gearbox!

1,544 32,127

Classic Cars (10 Viewing)

Years of debate have yet to provide an 'acceptable to all' definition of the term 'Classic Car', so we are not about to start providing one. It's your forum, you post in accordance with your own idea of what it means. Austin Allegro anyone?

by rbs

4 Jun 2024 10:27

228 3,029

Track Day Forum (5 Viewing)

A forum to discuss all aspects of track days on circuit and airfields around the world. These events are becoming increasingly popular amongst the owners of performance cars.

404 2,500
